title: Am done with this game for a while
body:
https://image.prntscr.com/image/XsMEkindQeWCv9oVINb1ZQ.png

Comes invisible, shoots us down before we can even react.

Consider this my last game of the year. I am done with the game for now this just gets on my nerves. 

###### inb4: "why no ban twitch then?"

replies.body:
>Consider this my last game of the year

So see you in ~10 days?


#######NewYear'sJokes

tbh. I wrote that for a reason. I am fucking addicted to this game 
###### and Taliyah
I naturally can't stay away from it for too long so I figured 10 days wouldn't be too hard.
Tbh I'm the same way. I'm completely addicted to playing this game, and to Sona. Right now would probably be a great time for.me to take a little break from League but I cant seem to do it.
Yeah as Sona you'll be playing caster minion simulator until 25 min
Yup, I said that exact thing over on the Sona mains subreddit ;u;

I think we are all addicted to one extreme. I am a support main. They killed my champ (Sona) and Bot is a mess right now.

I said I was going to quit. And I did! For a week.

I switched Roles. I went Mid and found this certain Nine-Tailed Fox for a Waifu

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

Long story short, I am so addicted I decided to just change roles rather than quit.... Though I must say, I like mid though. And I really like Ahri.
I was a mid/jungle main last season. I gave up my (old) Eve and Akali/Taliyah and discovered a certain floating lady and found myself maining the support role...
Pretty sure there are two floating ladies ({{champion:40}} {{champion:37}} )
Don't forget Nami!

I think by their Avatar they are talking about The Wind Goddess herself. 

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Correct!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

I was the same actually. I started playing this game as Morgana Mid, Eve (Old) Jungle. To think I actually knew Jungle Pathing back then. I got autofilled Jungle two nights ago and it was embarrassing. Made me instantly think Autofill was a bad idea (I am a Support Main, we never get Autofilled. In fact I was surprised I was put in Jungle when I was queuing up Mid/Support).

Then I found {{champion:37}} and {{champion:16}} around the same time. And a year plus of maining Sona later now I am back in Mid with Morgana and Ahri because Sona is in REALLY bad shape right now, Bot lane is a mess to play in and I feel better in Mid lane right now.

I feel your pain with Sona; she and Morgy were my go-to supports when I would feel like playing support historically. I still play her on occasion (usually if I'm in a group with friends) just to break out the DJ skin or in special modes (I love her in Ascension and Poro King even with her current state). I learned support on Soraka (both when she used to give mana and her reworked version we have now) so I still have a thing for her too.

Bot lane is absolutely a mess, but I've gotten a handle on it at this point and find myself enjoying support again. Some games are still absolute train wrecks though.

Good luck with Ahri! As a random side note, according to my year in review she was my third most played mid (behind Akali and Taliyah), so apparently I like her more than I realized!

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

#HAHAHAHAHAHA
-------------------


 ##See yah 2morrow buddy <3

######feels bad man I'm the same

That isn't even that bad. 

https://imgur.com/6FYthfW
To be fair though that's a Lux with no MR against a 5 and a half item Kassadin with Liandry's and Sorcerer Shoes. With his magic pen, he was almost dealing true damage.
I mean to be fair kassadin is stupid for a while now.

\>a while

\>not picked at worlds

I mean clearly shows you don't understand the game and what is important in pro play. 
And that is lane priority, push power, roam. 
Something kassa doesn't have and other champs do better, faster and safer.
Actually probably greater than true damage. Lux has 38 MR in the screenshot. {{item:3151}} + {{item:3020}} + Sudden Impact = 41 mag pen
thats not how flat pen works
Thats exactly how flat pen works lol

Quote from the wiki

>Magic Penetration cannot affect enemy magic resistance beyond 0 to deal bonus damage.

It does not work that way. If you want to go below 0 mr you need mr reduction, not penetration.

> greater than true damage

I mean, I'm pretty sure Riot stated somewhere that you can't actually make someone's resistances "negative" from flat pen, so really we can just say 38 mag pen.

~~Trundle ulting a sej on the other hand...~~

Not negative, but basically 0, meaning he's doing ***DAMAGE WITH NO REDUCTIUON***

AKA true damage

**AHEM**

> _**greater**_ than

That is all
I'm just saying why the true damage line comes up. Some games (Wizard101/Elsword) have had negative resistance and it was cancer.

Even that isn't the worst yet.
https://thumb.ibb.co/nEFLn6/i56_cimgpsh_orig.png[/img]
Gonna need some context because from a look of the match it was a very fed Twitch against a support Taliyah with zero armor built.

That is how it was. But still. getting killed in just a tad over 1 sec when he came out invi is ridiculous. 

Besides the range of his stealth or whatever it is is so damn small. Can't even flash away from his ult range so fast.
its only bad when assassins do it fren :]
well........what do you expect exactly then? This could just be '***(insert any fed carry here)*** blows up  ***(insert any behind support with zero defenses here)***'
Other fed carries don't get invis and a shit ton of range though, to be fair.
Yeah,but they are meant to do it.Twitch can kill an entire team.

I feel like there are just generally more options when fighting a kha zix though.

Because of him being melee, you have a lot more way to out-maneuver him, assuming you have the proper reflexes.

When it comes to twitch, the most you can do is flash and hope that he either doesn't have vision of you or has already gotten stunned so he can't chase you.

and before you say WTF is Fiddlesticks doing there, too many times has he appeared out of nowhere with his ult + a terrify.  The only thing worse than insta dying, is dying slowly whilst being able to do nothing about it!
Point and click fear ftw
you had a support {{champion:163}}. you were doomed from the start.

Taliyah's second role is support and since the enemy team had xerath support I figured I'd pick Taliyah.

Tho the game went super horrible for me and the team. Me having one of the worst games this year (kda wise) and our ezreal constantly blaming our midlaner and me for everything didn't help the case.

> [{quoted}](name=JungleTaliyahWTF,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ExB61hbZ,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-12-21T21:26:10.143+0000)
>
> Taliyah's second role is support and since the enemy team had xerath support I figured I'd pick Taliyah.
> 
> Tho the game went super horrible for me and the team. Me having one of the worst games this year (kda wise) and our ezreal constantly blaming our midlaner and me for everything didn't help the case.

according to that logic, kog'maw is a mage and gangplank is a support.
Kog'Maw mage is still very viable.

Tali support is pretty legit. 
Had a 100% winrate on her for like 15 games last season whenever i was autofilled, then lost all games when playing her mid lul. 
But seriously tali support is really good especially now that poke supports like xerath are meta.

> [{quoted}](name=gabetheguy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ExB61hbZ,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2017-12-21T21:35:13.044+0000)
>
> according to that logic, kog'maw is a mage and gangplank is a support.

And both {{champion:96}} and {{champion:41}} were played as a Mage and a Support respectively until Riot nerfed/reworked them. So yeah, the logic does apply to a degree. Not our fault Riot hates Off-Meta play the moment it appears.
Yeah , I have the same issue , also yesterday I played a match where I was {{champion:110}} and had full hp and died from {{champion:105}} Ult only LOL

This is what happens when we remove MR RUNES

REEEEEEEEEEEEE

It's pretty easy to counter him with an assassin really. Especially Kayn.

But see you in 9 days, i guess.
